title: rachael9385
author: rachael9385
created_time: September 30, 2023, 11:00:22 PMLast edit: October 01, 2023, 08:25:40 AM by rachael9385
content: Abeg make una pardon me if this kind of thread already exists for this we board, this thread nah about the independent and any other updates way dey go on for we country.Today go make Nigeria +1 years old, so I go like make we wish our Country a happy birthday and a wonderful present, I go want make the birthday present be just images and well wishes for the our country, make we no reason any how the economy bad reach or how things hard for the country but make we wish the country well as today nah special day for our own country (special day way we no go fit forget). NIGERIA @63 YEARS.First of all, this our country nah hero, if to say Nigeria and the citizens of this we country no be hero, we for no fit survive for this country from then days up till now, so I go like make we click this link so that we go still gather small ideas of how Nigeria take gain  INDEPENDENT for the year 1960.So let's sing the national anthem and the pledge together.NATIONAL ANTHEMFirst standard.:Arise, O Compatriots:Arise, O Compatriots,Nigeria's call obeyTo serve our FatherlandWith love and strength and faith.The labour of our heroes pastShall never be in vain,To serve with heart and mightOne nation bound in freedom, peace and unity.Second standard:O God of creation:O God of creationDirect our noble cause;Guide our Leaders right:Help our Youth the truth to know,In love and honesty to grow,And living just and true,Great lofty heights attain,To build a nation where peace and justice reignNational pledgeI pledge:I pledge to Nigeria my country.To be faithful, loyal and honest.To serve Nigeria with all my strength.To defend her unity, and uphold her honour and glory.So help me God.so make we all wish we country 9ja Wella.I go aalways dey post new new updates for this thread if any new things dey go on for the country and if you self get anything to share about we country 9ja, you fit still drop am here.brought to your table by @rachael9385.

comments.author: Abdulzuruku01
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on September 30, 2023, 11:00:22 PMAbeg make una pardon me if this kind of thread already exists for this we board, this thread nah about the independent and any other updates way dey go on for we country.Today go make Nigeria +1 years old, so I go like make we wish our Country a happy birthday and a wonderful present, I go want make the birthday present be just images and well wishes for the our country, make we no reason any how the economy bad reach or how things hard for the country but make we wish the country well as today nah special day for our own country (special day way we no go fit forget). NIGERIA @+1YEARS.First of all, this our country nah hero, if to say Nigeria and the citizens of this we country no be hero, we for no fit survive for this country from then days up till now, so I go like make we click this link so that we go still gather small ideas of how Nigeria take gain  INDEPENDENT for the year 1960.So let's sing the national anthem and the pledge together.NATIONAL ANTHEMFirst standard.:Arise, O Compatriots:Arise, O Compatriots,Nigeria's call obeyTo serve our FatherlandWith love and strength and faith.The labour of our heroes pastShall never be in vain,To serve with heart and mightOne nation bound in freedom, peace and unity.Second standard:O God of creation:O God of creationDirect our noble cause;Guide our Leaders right:Help our Youth the truth to know,In love and honesty to grow,And living just and true,Great lofty heights attain,To build a nation where peace and justice reignNational pledgeI pledge:I pledge to Nigeria my country.To be faithful, loyal and honest.To serve Nigeria with all my strength.To defend her unity, and uphold her honour and glory.So help me God.so make we all wish we country 9ja Wella.I go aalways dey post new new updates for this thread if any new things dey go on for the country and if you self get anything to share about we country 9ja, you fit still drop am here.brought to your table by @rachael9385.I know most of us go dey feel bad that our country dey celebrate independence day and we the masses dey suffer, I understand the pain sha, but still he no get as he be Naija na still our country and god knows why em choose Naija for us as our country. So this wan sef na enough reason for us to celebrate our country.. Once again happy independence to us

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Op! For this your matter, no body get joy o... Looking from the beginning of independent till now nothing to show forth. Celebration suppose to make sense when we Don achieve a lot of things, but check around you and tell me something wey go ft ginger me to celebrate am?Nigeria dey celebrate independent say $1 na 1k naira abi 1 bag of cement na 6k or bag of rice na 45k abi 1 kg of gas na1k abi na petrol wey be 650naira per litre.  I no even know were to even start to dey explain wetting go make me no celebrate.Nigeria @63 everywhere dey calm like cemetry. You don't ask yourself why? Na bad government. The way I dey see 9ja ehh if them continue like this crime go still increase o.  Plenty people wey no ft afford rent go go back to the village o.To build sefcon or 2bedroom apartment now be like person eey wan build upstairs. Dem say pikin go pass papa Nigeria leaders don make be like say papa naim go pass pikin.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: My brother you try for the thread about Nigerian independence but the truth be say me too don ask questions for the street about this independence and guys no see any reason to celebrate anything about am. If na before wey Nigerians never wake up for the way wey dem dey run this country, people for still dey sheepishly celebrate, buy clothes, do different attire on their own to celebrate but na only government fit do all those once now and do all the showbiz for television. I wonder how many people go listen to the broadcast because now we sabi say everything na wash. No road, no refinery, no security, no job etc everything na lie. So you no fit flog pikin make you still tell am say make him no cry. At least we still know about the jakpa syndrome, the cheating is too much.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on October 01, 2023, 03:21:15 PMMy brother you try for the thread about Nigerian independence but the truth be say me too don ask questions for the street about this independence and guys no see any reason to celebrate anything about am. If na before wey Nigerians never wake up for the way wey dem dey run this country, people for still dey sheepishly celebrate, buy clothes, do different attire on their own to celebrate but na only government fit do all those once now and do all the showbiz for television. I wonder how many people go listen to the broadcast because now we sabi say everything na wash. No road, no refinery, no security, no job etc everything na lie. So you no fit flog pikin make you still tell am say make him no cry. At least we still know about the jakpa syndrome, the cheating is too much.We all get everything to vex or talk about for this we country, but as at least our life's no dey for government hand or even our future, Nigeria nah nice place to stay as e be say nah free country but nowe no be like that again, just take a good look at how naira was compared to Ghana cedis as of then, but now look clear you see that Ghana cedis is more bigger than naira, so if you may even as me were this country is going to, me I know know oo but as today nah Independence day make we live matter for only today.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on October 01, 2023, 03:21:15 PMMy brother you try for the thread about Nigerian independence but the truth be say me too don ask questions for the street about this independence and guys no see any reason to celebrate anything about am. If na before wey Nigerians never wake up for the way wey dem dey run this country, people for still dey sheepishly celebrate, buy clothes, do different attire on their own to celebrate but na only government fit do all those once now and do all the showbiz for television. I wonder how many people go listen to the broadcast because now we sabi say everything na wash. No road, no refinery, no security, no job etc everything na lie. So you no fit flog pikin make you still tell am say make him no cry. At least we still know about the jakpa syndrome, the cheating is too much.Driving by to church today through the city gate Abuja Nigeria I was greeted with a view boards of pictures of Nigeria past president and at the city gate a crowd where gathered as early as 6am to celebrate Nigeria @63 there is no doubt the fact that Nigeria may be lacking in some areas but the fact still remains that we have to celebrate Nigerians for being a strong Nation where God have blessed with abundant human resources,  because even though the government have failed us,  we still remain resilience as a people in pursuit pf our individual despite the numerous economic crisis. So for the fact that Nigerians are strong survivors is enough for us to celebrate the birthday of the country being 63 is not a joke and we pray and work for a better Nigeria.

comments.author: Commorant
comments.body: I fit tell una say nothing fit make me happy about this independence celebration. See the way price of thing don dey high, for this kind period wey people no dey even see wtin to chop. Even the inflow of cash no dey okay wey be say na still our money oo, but we no dey see am Carry chop food... E dey pain,walai!See the dollar rate to naira? Shey how una see am? If them wan go import goods now carry come, the marketers them go come add all Thier expenses, and the price of things go high Wella.. Omo, the number of people wey dey fall for ajah bridge commit homicide dey too much... Just because them no fit meetup. Make them choke eye for the we matter First make everybody dey alright before any celebration abeg.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Commorant on October 01, 2023, 09:45:37 PMI fit tell una say nothing fit make me happy about this independence celebration. See the way price of thing don dey high, for this kind period wey people no dey even see wtin to chop. Even the inflow of cash no dey okay wey be say na still our money oo, but we no dey see am Carry chop food... E dey pain,walai!See the dollar rate to naira? Shey how una see am? If them wan go import goods now carry come, the marketers them go come add all Thier expenses, and the price of things go high Wella.. Omo, the number of people wey dey fall for ajah bridge commit homicide dey too much... Just because them no fit meetup. Make them choke eye for the we matter First make everybody dey alright before any celebration abeg.I see say this we country so things dey very hard and pipo no supposed to dey get joy as things hard but that one no mean say as we dey alive to see how the independence day go dey happy, things hard things hard but we still dey alive to see to day and by God grace we go still see tomorrow and others days way dey come for front, as we celebrate the independence day way done pass so, no be our government we celebrate, nah the nation as a whole nah we celebrate, because if to say this country no stand string, my guy, maybe we for no gain independent for 1st October 1969, sono be Nigeria hard, nah the leaders of the country nai make am dey hard so, reason am be for be for, how the country dey easy and safe for both citizens and non citizens but now based on say our leaders, all of them nah pipo way dey go enter seat because of their selfish interest nai make things dey hard for pipo.
